interview.title: Ku-dayashada Wareysiga
interview.intro: Su'aalahan uga jawaab adigoo adeegsanaya habka STAR.
interview.hint_star: STAR = Situation, Task, Action, Result — ku dar faahfaahin gaaban.
interview.guidance_en_only: Su’aalaha waxay ahaanayaan Ingiriisi, laakiin hanuunintu waa ku qoran tahay afkaaga.
